name: Tempospace
description:
You are stuck in a room filled with a variety of objects armed with nothing but your trusty magic torch. Using your power to switch between night and day, solve puzzles and make your way out of the room..

Controls

  • Press WASD or the arrow keys to move.
  • Use the mouse to look around.
  • Use left-click to pick up objects.
  • Use right-click to activate your torch.
